At Ursus Homes, we believe that your home should fully reflect your personal style and seamlessly respond to the rhythm of your family and the way you live.

About

our projects

process

/ Pre-Building, Budgeting, & Scheduling

Only once we are confident that we fully-understand your goals, do we develop a detailed strategy, schedule, and budget to bring that vision to life.

/ Production & Building

We take a graceful approach to the production; skillfully navigating any changes, managing costs, and ensuring your project is completed within our set timeline.

/ Punch-List, Warranty, and Follow-Through

You’ll have the URSUS team at your side - long after your home is complete. We give you a generous warranty, and we’re only a phone call away if you need assistance.
